p: The final trees were summarized by selecting the tree with the maximum product of posterior probabilities (pp) (maximum clade credibility) after a 10% burn‚Äêin using Tree Annotator v.1.8.4 (included in the BEAST package) and were visualized using FigTree v.1.4.2 ( http://tree.bio.ed.ac.uk/software/figtree/).
